about_the_game:
Reflections Path is a turn-based, adventure RPG. The game, visually, as well as the gameplay mechanics, helps to capture the classic, fantasy adventure RPG style from the past. A bit of information about the game, including key features is listed below. To get a sense of the game, a free demo is provided and available for download.



Introduction:

Mysterious energy fields have begun to appear and have caused changes to the world. There seems to be no explanation as to what the energy fields are, or why this is happening.

Strange weather occurrences have also coincided with the appearances of the energy fields.

Travel across various types of landscapes, such as foothills, forests and mountainous terrain, to find out the meaning of this phenomenon. With the help of the Sensory Scope, make your way through obstacles along the journey.



Key Features:

Adventure-filled story
- One-of-a-kind story is the backdrop to the different types of map levels and places visited along the journey.

Map Level Design
- Discover clues, gather information, and solve puzzles to clear obstacles in a particular area, and navigate landscapes.

Turn-based fantasy RPG
- Story and map areas are complimented with classic turn-based RPG elements. Unique energy field encounter sequences provide for an exciting challenge throughout the game.

Original Soundtrack
- Music created for the game adds to the story, and completes overall gameplay experience.




Controls:

- Directional Arrows on Keyboard: Move character/ Navigate options and menu screen
- Enter: Select options/ Action button
- ESC: Cancel choice selection on menus
- Shift: Access menu/ Exit menu on character screen

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better. Not supported: macOS Big Sur 11.0 and later.
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
